periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 62, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. South wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 69. South wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 62. South wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 77. South wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 44. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 52. North northwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 35. North northeast wind 3 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. East wind 5 to 8 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southeast wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 77. South wind 15 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. South southwest wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 69. South southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 7pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind around 9 mph.
